description: Create instant call links and assist streams to streamline communication and support. Record voice notes or capture photos to document issues. Explore available flows and launch guided workflows for faster troubleshooting.

tools.name: snapcall_call
tools.description: Create a Snapcall Call and return the link.

query.description: The search query (will be used as call description)

flowToken.description: The flow token to use to create the call

tools.name: snapcall_assist
tools.description: Create a Snapcall assist recording stream and return the link. This allow the user to record information or take photos you could exploit later.

query.description: The search query (will be used as clip description)

flowToken.description: The flow token to use to create the clip

tools.name: list_flow
tools.description:
List the available flows to create a stream.
A flow is a list of steps that can be executed in sequence in snapcall in order to help the user to communicate his issue.
return a list of name, description and a token. You can use the toke to create a stream.
